name: ReHack
description: The hacking simulator, which consists of many mini-games, which together all merge into one, composite game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Pentium G Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 220 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
